title: B'luru stampede: Siddaramaiah says 'happened at many places'; name-drops Maha Kumbh
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah addressed the Bengaluru stampede that resulted in 11 fatalities, ordering a magisterial inquiry while refraining from defending the incident. He referenced past tragedies like the Kumbh Mela, while the BJP criticized the Congress-led government for negligence, citing inadequate planning and security.

title: 9 aircraft, radar sites: Details emerge of Pak's big losses during Op Sindoor
content: Operation Sindoor, India's retaliatory strikes following the Pahalgam terror attack, decimated significant Pakistani military assets, including fighter jets and missile systems. The Indian Air Force targeted key airbases using air-launched cruise missiles, prompting Pakistan to seek a ceasefire within four days. India dismissed Pakistan's claims of civilian casualties as propaganda, asserting strikes were limited to terror infrastructure.

title: Canada's new Bill to tackle asylum claims; how it will affect Indian students
content: Canada's Strong Borders Act aims to bolster border security and curb fraudulent asylum claims, particularly from international students. The bill introduces stricter timelines for asylum applications and enhances information sharing between immigration authorities and other government bodies. These measures respond to rising migration pressures and seek to protect the integrity of Canada's immigration system amid increasing backlogs and policy changes.

title: Tragedy mars RCB's IPL title celebrations: BCCI questions organisers
content: A stampede occurred outside Chinnaswamy Stadium during RCB's victory celebration. The incident resulted in fatalities and injuries. IPL Governing Council Chairman Arun Dhumal contacted the franchise about the situation. BCCI Secretary Davajit Saikia called the incident unfortunate.

title: War twist: Ukraine’s drone used my open-source code, says shocked developer
content: ArduPilot, an open-source software initially created for hobbyist drones, has reportedly been used in a Ukrainian attack that destroyed a portion of Russia's strategic bomber fleet. The software's creators expressed surprise at its military application, as it was originally designed for peaceful purposes like search and rescue and autonomous vehicles.

title: 'Heartrending': PM Modi says 'thoughts with those who lost loved ones' in stampede
content: A stampede near M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru resulted in multiple fatalities and injuries, prompting Prime Minister Modi to express his grief. While initial reports indicated eight deaths, BJP Karnataka chief Vijayendra claimed a higher toll, demanding a judicial inquiry. Authorities are investigating the incident, with conflicting reports emerging regarding the exact number of casualties during the RCB's IPL 2025 victory celebration.

title: Happy Eid-ul-Adha 2025: Best Eid Mubarak messages, quotes, wishes, and more
content: Eid-ul-Adha 2025 approaches, heralding a time for Muslims worldwide to commemorate Prophet Ibrahim's devotion through prayers, sacrifices, and acts of charity. Celebrations are expected to begin on June 7th, emphasizing unity and spreading joy with heartfelt messages and traditions. The festival underscores themes of sacrifice, compassion, and obedience.

title: Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis: If I were a student right now, I would study ...
content: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis advises students to prioritize STEM subjects and embrace AI tools for future job market success. Speaking at SXSW London, he emphasized the importance of understanding mathematical and scientific fundamentals. Hassabis predicts AI will create valuable jobs for technically skilled individuals, urging students to gain hands-on experience with AI systems.

title: B'luru stampede: BJP blames Cong's 'haste'; DKS gives 'ended in 10 mins' reply
content: Following a tragic stampede at an RCB IPL victory celebration in Bengaluru, Karnataka's Deputy CM, DK Shivakumar, has urged the public to remain calm, assuring that the government is working to restore normalcy. The incident, reportedly caused by overcrowding and mismanagement, resulted in multiple fatalities and injuries.

title: RCB victory parade turns tragic: Child among several dead - top developments
content: Tragedy struck Royal Challengers Bengaluru's IPL victory celebrations as a stampede near Chinnaswamy Stadium resulted in eight fatalities and over 40 injuries. Overwhelmed by massive crowds, police struggled to maintain control despite a heavy presence. The Karnataka government's prior cancellation of a victory parade due to security concerns proved prescient.

title: Bengaluru stampede: How chaos unfolded; what we know so far
content: A stampede at Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy Stadium during RCB victory celebrations has reportedly resulted in multiple fatalities and injuries, though official confirmation is pending. Karnataka's deputy CM D K Shivakumar stated that he has no confirmed reports of deaths and urged calm, noting the program was shortened due to the massive crowd. Police struggled to manage the large number of fans attempting to enter the stadium, despite entry restrictions.

title: How this London startup made 700 engineers sitting in India pose as AI tool
content: Builder.ai, once valued at $1.5 billion, has filed for bankruptcy after being exposed for misleading investors about its AI capabilities. The company, backed by Microsoft and Qatar's sovereign wealth fund, allegedly used Indian engineers to manually code apps while marketing them as AI-generated. This deception led to financial misrepresentations, regulatory scrutiny, and ultimately, the company's downfall.

title: Chaos in Bengaluru: Fans climb over car, crush vehicle - Video
content: Celebrations for Royal Challengers Bengaluru's anticipated IPL title win descended into chaos in Bengaluru. A stampede outside the M Chinnaswamy Stadium resulted in at least seven fatalities and over 25 injuries. Frenzied fans damaged a car, shattering its windshield and denting the roof. Massive crowds had gathered to celebrate, but the jubilation quickly turned into disorder.

title: Census from March 2027: Caste enumeration to be part of exercise
content: The next nationwide census will begin on March 1, 2027, with Jammu and Kashmir, Ladakh, and Uttarakhand starting earlier in October 2026. For the first time in over seven decades, the census will include caste enumeration to ensure transparency and national consistency.

title: 'Let me speak...': Virat Kohli struggles to speak as crowd goes crazy during celebrations
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) celebrated their first IPL title win with fans at M Chinnaswamy Stadium. Virat Kohli praised captain Rajat Patidar and the team's loyal supporters, emphasizing their unwavering support over 18 years. Karnataka's Deputy CM and Governor congratulated RCB, acknowledging the team's long-awaited success and Kohli's dedication.

title: Allahabad HC rebukes Rahul: Free speech has limits, Army can't be defamed
content: The Allahabad High Court has rebuked Congress leader Rahul Gandhi regarding his alleged derogatory remarks against the Indian Army, emphasizing that freedom of speech under Article 19(1)(a) is subject to reasonable restrictions and does not extend to defamatory statements.

title: 'Love him': Allen Iverson gets emotional expressing feelings for Shaquille O'Neal
content: Shaquille O’Neal and Allen Iverson recently shared a heartfelt interview. Iverson expressed deep affection and respect for O’Neal. The duo, former All-Star teammates, promoted their Netflix docuseries, Power Moves. Iverson became emotional discussing their bond. They also collaborated as Reebok Basketball executives. The docuseries features their efforts to revive Reebok's basketball division. Their friendship highlights strong NBA camaraderies.

title: Watch: Fans climb trees and buses to witness RCB’s IPL victory
content: Bengaluru celebrated Royal Challengers Bengaluru's first IPL victory. Thousands of fans gathered, expressing joy after the team beat Punjab Kings. Celebrations started at Vidhana Soudha, where the Karnataka government held a felicitation. The team paraded to Chinnaswamy Stadium in an open-top bus. Over ten thousand fans joined the celebrations at the stadium.

title: 'Young and dumb': Jason Whitlock calls Stefon Diggs & Cardi B a ghetto version
content: Jason Whitlock critiques Stefon Diggs' priorities, suggesting his focus has shifted from football to celebrity, highlighted by his association with Cardi B. Whitlock compares their pairing unfavorably to Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, deeming it a "ghetto version." T.J. Moe questions Diggs' value to the Patriots, citing declining performance and a potential distraction.

title: '18 years for me, 11 for her': Virat Kohli's touching message for Anushka Sharma
content: Virat Kohli's raw emotion poured out as Royal Challengers Bengaluru clinched their first IPL title, defeating Punjab Kings. Overwhelmed, Kohli collapsed on the field before sharing a tearful embrace with his wife, Anushka Sharma. He expressed their shared journey and relief, highlighting Anushka's special connection to Bangalore, making the victory even more meaningful for them both.

title: Happy Eid-ul-Adha 2025: Eid Mubarak images, wishes, messages, quotes and more
content: Eid-ul-Adha 2025 approaches, a time for Muslims worldwide to celebrate the Festival of Sacrifice. People are seeking heartfelt images, wishes, messages, and quotes to share with loved ones on social media platforms. The festival emphasizes love, compassion, and togetherness, encouraging acts of kindness and generosity in remembrance of Prophet Ibrahim's devotion.

title: Kuldeep Yadav gets engaged to childhood friend Vanshika in Lucknow
content: Indian cricket star Kuldeep Yadav, fondly known as the 'Chinaman,' recently celebrated his engagement to Vanshika, his childhood sweetheart, in a private ceremony in Lucknow. The intimate affair was graced by family and fellow cricketers, including Rinku Singh. While the couple has kept details under wraps, photos have surfaced online, sparking congratulatory messages.

title: AI cyber fraud: Inside Delhi’s ‘telecaller trap’; fraud kits, dummy a/cs powered racket
content: In Delhi, a sextortion gang led by Jahid allegedly used AI and social media to blackmail vulnerable individuals. Jayshree lured victims, while others impersonated police. Another call center, managed by Ujjawal Pandey and Gaurav Barua, offered fake loans, extracting fees before cutting contact. Telecallers like Akshita, Dimple, and Pinki, under Dilshad Ali, posed as loan representatives, deceiving customers.

title: Trump visa curbs: 'Totally quiet,' Cong questions PM's silence
content: Congress has voiced concerns over the potential impact of Donald Trump's visa policies on Indian students in the US, noting that approximately 337,630 Indian students pursued higher education there in 2024. Jairam Ramesh criticised PM Modi and EAM Jaishankar for their silence on the matter, contrasting it with China's strong reaction to protect its students' interests.

title: 'True definition of a son': NBA legend Allen Iverson shares heartfelt post
content: Allen Iverson recently shared a heartfelt Instagram post praising his son, Isaiah Rahsaan Iverson, highlighting his admirable qualities and expressing immense pride. This follows a previous dedication to his ex-wife, Tawanna Turner, showcasing their past together. Despite facing financial struggles post-retirement, Iverson's life is seemingly improving with a new role at Reebok.

title: Chenab bridge: PM Modi to inaugrate world’s highest railway arch bridge
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate the Chenab Bridge, the world's highest railway arch bridge, marking a significant step towards enhanced connectivity in the region. The Vande Bharat trains will traverse the bridge, reducing travel time between Katra and Srinagar to approximately three hours.

title: Honeymooner hacked to death in Meghalaya: What wife’s last call to mom-in-law hinted at
content: Indore honeymooner Raja Raghuvanshi was found murdered in a gorge near Weisawdong falls, Meghalaya, with evidence suggesting he was hacked to death with a machete. Police are investigating the crime, searching for his missing wife, Sonam, and the culprits, while the family demands a CBI probe and Army assistance.

title: Is WW3 near? Meet hypnotherapist Nicolas Aujula whose 2025 warning sparks fear
content: Amid global instability, psychic Nicolas Aujula's 2025 predictions are gaining traction, echoing Baba Vanga's mystique. Aujula foresees a potential World War III fueled by a lack of compassion, alongside natural disasters and political shifts. His past accuracy, including predictions of Trump's return and the rise of AI, lends credibility to his alarming visions.

title: Virat Kohli's curious IPL trophy peek; RCB star checks what's inside
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru won the Indian Premier League after 18 seasons. They defeated Punjab Kings in a thrilling final. Virat Kohli, an iconic player, expressed his joy. He dedicated the win to the fans and the team's resilience. Kohli also shared a heartfelt message on Instagram. He amassed 657 runs this season.

title: 'Parliamentophobia': TMC MP after Centre calls Monsoon Session
content: TMC leader Derek O'Brien accuses the Modi government of "Parliamentophobia" for allegedly avoiding parliamentary scrutiny. This jab follows the INDIA bloc's request for a special session to discuss Operation Sindoor. The opposition emphasizes the need for parliamentary debate on critical national security issues, while the government suggests addressing these concerns during the upcoming Monsoon session.

title: 10 hidden facts about Earth: Amazing truths that sound like sci-fi stories
content: Earth harbors incredible secrets, from remnants of a planet that formed the Moon residing deep within, to ancient auroras illuminating the skies. The planet's molten core influenced early human migration, while ancient crystals reveal water existed 4.3 billion years ago. Discoveries like a supernova's mark in the ocean and a sinking North America highlight Earth's dynamic and surprising history.

title: Hot topic: Shaquille O’Neal makes Travis Kelce dances to Taylor Swift’s song
content: NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal surprised everyone by revealing his love for Taylor Swift's song. He sang along to 'I Knew You Were Trouble' on the Kelce brothers' podcast. Travis Kelce also mentioned Taylor Swift regained ownership of her music. The Kelce brothers welcomed Shaquille O’Neal to their New Heights podcast. The episode is set to premiere on June 4, 2025.

title: SC quashes rape charges: Man refuses to marry woman over ‘aggressive sexual nature’
content: The Supreme Court has dismissed rape charges against a man, citing the woman's "aggressive sexual behaviour" and manipulative tendencies. Justices Nath and Mehta referenced social media chats where the woman, known as 'Muffin,' admitted to manipulation and targeting men for personal gain, including seeking a green card.

title: 'Really hard': LeBron James’ wife reveals how being a teen mom affected her
content: Savannah James, wife of LeBron James, recently shared her experiences with motherhood on the podcast 'Everybody’s Crazy,' revealing how it shaped her identity. She admitted struggling to find herself outside of being a mom, especially with her sons.

title: Anushka Sharma joins Virat Kohli for RCB's IPL victory celebrations; crowd goes crazy
content: After 18 seasons of anticipation, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) clinched their first IPL title, defeating Punjab Kings in a thrilling final. Virat Kohli's emotional celebration with his wife, Anushka Sharma, captured the historic moment. The victory marked a significant milestone for the franchise and its loyal fanbase, rewarding their unwavering support over the years.

title: 'Vindictive nature': Imran Khan alleges Asim Munir targeted his wife
content: Imran Khan has accused Pakistan's army chief, General Asim Munir, of a personal vendetta against his wife, Bushra Bibi, stemming from Munir's removal as ISI chief. Khan alleges that Bibi's imprisonment and mistreatment are due to Munir's vindictive nature, further claiming she refused contact after his dismissal.

title: Weeks before attack, Colorado terror suspect’s daughter praised US for giving her future
content: Just before Mohamed Soliman's alleged terror attack in Colorado, his daughter Habiba spoke of her American dream. Now, following the antisemitic attack in Boulder, both are in ICE custody facing deportation. Soliman is accused of throwing Molotov cocktails at a pro-Israeli hostage march, injuring twelve.

title: Watch: When 'spy' YouTubers Jyoti Malhotra and Jasbir Singh were together in Pakistan
content: Indian authorities are investigating YouTubers Jyoti Malhotra and Jasbir Singh for alleged espionage linked to Pakistani intelligence. Malhotra, known as "Travel with Jo," is accused of sharing sensitive information and maintaining contact with Pakistani officials via encrypted apps.

title: RCB fans celebrate IPL victory with Vijay Mallya posters in Bengaluru
content: After an 18-year wait, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) finally secured their first IPL title, sparking wild celebrations in Bengaluru, where fans were seen holding posters of Vijay Mallya. RCB defeated Punjab Kings by six runs in a thrilling final at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. RCB posted 190/9, while PBKS fell short at 184/7.

title: 'Back to...': Kohli’s heart warming message to Salt after RCB’s IPL triumph
content: Phil Salt experienced a whirlwind 48 hours, contributing to Royal Challengers Bengaluru's IPL victory and becoming a father. Despite not scoring big in the final, his earlier impact and a crucial catch helped RCB secure the win against Punjab Kings. Virat Kohli celebrated Salt's dual success, highlighting his commitment to both cricket and family as he embraced fatherhood.

title: RCB fan dies of heart attack during victory celebrations in Karnataka
content: Manjunath Irappa Kambar, a 28-year-old RCB supporter, tragically died of a heart attack while celebrating the team's IPL victory in Avaradi village. He had organized a large celebration, foregoing sleep and meals to ensure its success. Overwhelmed with joy after RCB's win, he collapsed while dancing, leaving behind his pregnant wife, daughter and grieving family.

title: 'Equally yours, biscotti': Virat Kohli shares IPL trophy with AB de Villiers
content: Royal Challengers Bangalore secured their first IPL title in Ahmedabad. They defeated Punjab Kings by 6 runs in a thrilling final. Virat Kohli dedicated the victory to AB de Villiers. Kohli shared an emotional moment with De Villiers after the win. Kohli acknowledged De Villiers' immense contribution to the franchise. RCB posted 190/9, and Hazlewood's final over sealed the victory.

title: Bengaluru Stampede Video Shows People Panicking, Trying To Save Others
content: A video of the chaos that unfolded outside the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru has emerged, showing thousands of people standing at the gates of the stadium, which is locked by the security.

title: Aviation Regulator Pulls Up Turkish Airlines Over Safety Violations
content: The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) found multiple safety violations in Turkish Airlines operations during surprise inspections carried out between May 29 and June 2 at four major Indian airports.

title: Man Killed After His Car Collides Head-On With Tanker In UP's Kushinagar
content: A man died after his car collided head-on with a tanker in Hata area of Uttar Pradesh's Kushinagar district, police said on Wednesday.

title: "Stadium Capacity 35,000 But 2-3 lakh Turned Up": Siddaramaiah On RCB Tragedy
content: Hours after 11 people died in a stampede today, Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah admitted they did not expect such huge crowds to turn up at the IPL victory celebrations of RCB in Bengaluru.

title: "Let Chief Minister Fix Responsibility": Karnataka BJP Head On Stampede
content: The Karnataka BJP has demanded action and accountability over lapses that led to two stampedes in Bengaluru during the IPL victory celebrations of RCB. Eleven people were killed in stampedes.

title: "Officials Inside Stadium Weren't Aware": IPL Chairman On Celebrations Amid Tragedy
content: Officials who were inside a stadium in Bengaluru during the RCB victory celebrations were not aware what was happening outside, IPL chairman Arun Dhumal said, hours after 11 people were killed in two stampedes.

title: 11 Dead In Stampede Outside Bengaluru Stadium Amid RCB Celebrations
content: The frenzied celebration in Bengaluru over RCB winning the IPL after 18 long years took a tragic turn with at least 11 people feared dead in a stampede.

title: Chinnaswamy Stadium Stampede LIVE: 11 Dead In Bengaluru Stampede; Siddaramaiah Says Over 2 Lakh Showed Up
content: Chinnaswamy Stadium stampede LIVE Updates: At least 11 people died and 50 were injured outside the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru as thousands of fans gathered to greet the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) after winning the IPL.

title: "Players Had Commitments": Siddaramaiah Aide On Short Notice For RCB Event
content: The size of the crowd that had gathered for the celebrations of RCB's victory in the IPL was unexpected and "nobody could have visualised it", Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah's Political Secretary Naseer Ahmed has said.

title: "Extremely Confident": Indian Astronaut On Space Mission
content: The Axiom-4 space mission having been pushed back by two days, Indian astronaut Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, who is part of the Axiom team, said he was confident of success.

title: Buses Operating On Polluting Fuels Banned From Entering Delhi From Nov 2026
content: No bus should be allowed to enter Delhi from November 1, 2026, unless it runs on clean fuel like CNG, electricity or the latest BS-VI diesel, the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) directed on Wednesday.

title: 65-Year-Old Man, Smoking Beedi Inside Home, Dies After Clothes Catch Fire
content: Smoking beedi (hand-rolled thin cigarettes) is considered injurious to health, but it turned fatal for a 65-year-old man in Bhandara district of Maharashtra when an ignited beedi triggered a fire and engulfed him.

title: Man Robbed Of Rs 14.5 Lakh Cash Garland At Gunpoint After Rajasthan Wedding
content: Made from around 3,000 notes of Rs 500 each, the garland was meant as a grand gesture to honour the groom.

title: 82% Of Pre-Monsoon Silting Done In Mumbai, 61% In Mithi River Amid Scam Probe
content: Desilting of the Mithi River, a key component in the city's flood-prevention system, remains challenging due to early rains and ongoing investigations into a Rs 65 crore scam.

title: Who Is Jasbir Singh, YouTuber Arrested In Punjab For Spying For Pakistan
content: Jasbir Singh runs a YouTube channel 'JaanMahal Video' and minly creates travel videos documenting his trips to countries like Malaysia, Maldives, Thailand and others.

title: Bengaluru To Maha Kumbh, List Of Major Stampedes In India Since Last Year
content: RCB's IPL victory celebration in Bengaluru turned ghastly as stampedes broke out outside the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru and Vidhana Souda.

title: Tejashwi Yadav Slams Nitish Kumar Over Muzaffarpur Rape Case
content: Bihar Leader of the Opposition, Tejashwi Yadav, launched a scathing attack on Chief Minister Nitish Kumar and his government on Monday over the Muzaffarpur rape case and medical negligence at PMCH that led to the death of a 10-year-old Dalit girl.

title: Woman's Body Found Stuffed In Trolley Bag In Hyderabad: Police
content: The body of an unidentified woman was found stuffed in a trolley bag and dumped in bushes in Bachupally area here on Wednesday, police said.

title: 9 Killed, 2 Injured As Truck Overturns On Van In Madhya Pradesh's Jhabua
content: Nine persons, including five minors, were killed and two others injured after a cement-laden trailer truck overturned and crushed a van in Madhya Pradesh's Jhabua district in the wee hours of Wednesday, police said.

title: We pitched trade offers for three NFL stars: Landing spots for Ramsey, Cousins, Hendrickson
content: Kirk Cousins, Trey Hendrickson and Jalen Ramsey could all be traded soon. We crafted potential offers -- and picked the best deals.

title: Signings, trades who will benefit most from a new team
content: Who gained most from moving to a new organization over the past few months? Let's evaluate 15 additions.

title: Bettor banned for heckling Olympic star Thomas
content: FanDuel has banned a bettor who posted a video of himself heckling Gabby Thomas at a recent track event and claimed "it made my parlay win."

title: Sources: KAT gets treatment on playoff injuries
content: Karl-Anthony Towns has undergone treatment on his bruised left knee and to repair ligament damage on his left finger after suffering both injuries during the playoffs, sources told ESPN.

title: U.S. Amateur champ Ballester of Spain joins LIV
content: Jose Luis Ballester of Spain, the 2024 U.S. Amateur champion, has joined LIV Golf on a multiyear deal and will make his professional debut this week at the league's Virginia event.

title: More men allege sexual misconduct by ex-IU doc
content: At least 15 former Indiana men's basketball players are alleging improper sexual conduct by a former team physician and saying Indiana officials, including the late coach Bobby Knight, were aware of the behavior.

title: Barber details medical emergency that nixed fight
content: UFC flyweight Maycee Barber told ESPN on Tuesday that a medical complication in her locker room during warmups Saturday led to the last-minute cancellation of her UFC Fight Night bout against Erin Blanchfield.

title: Sportsbooks, bettors favor Oilers in Cup Final
content: Sportsbooks and bettors see the Oilers as slight favorites over the defending champion Panthers as the Stanley Cup Final gets underway Wednesday night in Edmonton.

title: Seahawks HC scoffs at notion Darnold won't start
content: Seahawks coach Mike Macdonald offered strong support of Sam Darnold after the quarterback struggled some during the first OTA that was open to reporters.

title: Wildest dream: France's Boisson heads to semis
content: French wild-card entry Loïs Boisson upset sixth-ranked Mirra Andreeva 7-6 (6), 6-3 in front of a boisterous and largely partisan crowd at Roland Garros to reach the semifinals of the French Open.

title: 🏀 Five Knicks questions after firing Thibodeau
content: NBA insiders examine why the Knicks parted ways with Thibodeau and which coaching candidates could be right for New York.

title: It takes a village? Inside the MLB ballpark model of the future
content: The Battery Atlanta is an enticing blueprint for teams. But creating an entire neighborhood is a hard act to follow.

title: The Paul George Trade is about to deliver an NBA title
content: The Thunder and Pacers can trace their superstars and their cores back to trades involving the nine-time All-Star wing.

title: 2025 FC 100: Yamal, Mbappe among best men's soccer players
content: It's that time again: with the UEFA Champions League final behind us and the 2024-25 season officially over, it's time to rank the top 100 players in the world of men's soccer right now. Welcome to the FC 100.

title: A big bullpen bust in L.A.? Is Soto unlucky? Are the O's cooked? An early verdict on 2025 disappointments
content: A number of teams and stars are still struggling two months into the season. Do their slow starts define who they are in 2025?

title: Texas Tech vs. Texas preview: Breaking down Canady's pitch, Kavan's surge and our prediction
content: The Women's College World Series finals start Wednesday, and here's what you need to know about Texas and Texas Tech.

title: 'I'm not naïve': Hugh Freeze knows Auburn needs to start winning soon
content: The Tigers have scored recruiting and portal wins of late -- now they have to deliver where it matters most.

title: Power Rankings: Dream ride four-game winning streak to move up in Week 3 edition
content: Las Vegas, Washington and Chicago join Atlanta as risers as the league begins Commissioner's Cup play.

title: NBA coaching carousel: What's next for Knicks' coaching job?
content: Which NBA coaching jobs are available? Which situations are the most appealing? We're breaking down each vacancy.

title: U.S. visa uncertainties put college rosters in a bind
content: College coaches and international athletes are stuck in an unnerving limbo, saying they're unsure how to plan for recent changes in U.S. student visa policy that could potentially wreak havoc on their rosters this year.

title: Source: Man City agree $62M deal for Reijnders
content: Manchester City have agreed a deal worth €55 million ($62m) with AC Milan for midfielder Tijjani Reijnders, a source has told ESPN.

title: Zubimendi cools Arsenal talk: 'Alonso my idol'
content: Martín Zubimendi has claimed his future remains open despite strong links to Arsenal, and admits new Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso is his "idol."

title: Source: Madrid push to sign River's Mastantuono
content: A representative of Real Madrid is in Buenos Aires to try to close the signing of River Plate star Franco Mastantuono, a source has told ESPN.

title: Rio Ferdinand: I'm a meme because of Man United
content: Manchester United legend Rio Ferdinand has told ESPN Brasil that being a pundit during the club's recent struggles has made him a meme on social media.

title: Sources: Barça hope to avoid severe UEFA penalty
content: Barcelona face further punishments for breaches of UEFA's financial fair play (FFP) regulations, but club sources are hopeful they will avoid any severe sanctions from the governing body.

title: Wirtz denies he wants No. 10 shirt at Liverpool
content: Florian Wirtz has denied reports that he wants the No. 10 shirt if he joins Liverpool this summer, in the Bayer Leverkusen star's strongest hint yet that a move to Anfield is progressing.

title: Sources: Chelsea keen on Maignan but balk at fee
content: Chelsea are exploring a deal to sign AC Milan goalkeeper Mike Maignan but the two clubs are a long way apart in their valuations, sources have told ESPN.

title: Gavi doubles down on critics: 'They have no idea'
content: Barcelona midfielder Gavi has doubled down on his claim that his critics have "f------ no idea" how good he is, saying people hate him for his style of play.

title: Stand aside, Messi and Ronaldo: Yamal and Doué are coming for you
content: Champions Leagues, World Cups, Ballons d'Or ... get ready for PSG's Désiré Doué and Barcelona's Lamine Yamal to become this generation's Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo.

title: Can underdog Julianna Peña pull off another title-fight shocker?
content: Peña enters her UFC 316 co-main event versus Kayla Harrison with long odds for the fourth straight fight.

content: Here's everything you need to know about Season 33 of TUF. From how to watch, the coaches involved and the fighters competing for a UFC contract.

content: Which teams have taken advantage of a hot transfer portal to be real contenders for 2025-26 as summer begins?

content: Tristan H. Cockcroft weighs in on if trading Aaron Judge is feasible... and offers five examples of what return value might even look like.

content: Arike Ogunbowale, Rhyne Howard and Ariel Atkins are some of the biggest movers in this week's fantasy women's basketball rankings.

content: As we prepare for Game 1 of the NBA Finals, we take a look back at the iconic images that defined these playoffs.

content: Preakness winner Journalism and Kentucky Derby winner Sovereignty have the best odds in the eight-horse field for Saturday's Belmont Stakes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye PSG striker Ramos
content: Manchester United could turn to Paris-Saint-Germain striker Goncalo Ramos after missing out on Ipswich Town's Liam Delap. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Government to bring new national policy on senior citizens
content: The Social Justice Ministry says discussions focused on how the draft policy should “reflect the demographic realities” of India as it heads into the future

title: Dishing out tasty treats made of milk
content: Final-year BTech (Dairy Technology) students of College of Dairy Science and Technology at Kaimanam run food stalls in the city selling value-added products from milk

title: Delimitation delay ploy to reduce Tamil Nadu’s voice in Parliament: CM Stalin
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister alleges BJP’s postponement of Census to 2027 is aimed at altering State’s representation and urges “fair delimitation”

title: Waqf Umeed portal tantamount to contempt of court, claims Muslim Board
content: The AIMPLB contends that at a time when petitions challenging the Waqf (Amendment) Act, 2025 are under consideration of the Supreme Court such a move is tantamount to contempt of court

title: Railways suspends 2.5 crore user IDs suspected of fraudulent ticket booking
content: IRCTC deployes anti-bot systems to curb bookings by unscrupulous agents and reduce bot traffic during the first five minutes of the Tatkal booking window

title: Bar Council nod for government law college in Chamarajanagar
content: College granted permission to admit 60 students for the three-year LL.B course for academic years 2025–26 and 2026–27

title: Kudumbashree to provide all vegetables needed for Onasadya: Minister
content: Inaugurates Onakani project for making available Onam kits that include vegetables, pickle, chips, payasam mix, and spice powders needed for a sadya

title: Complete TUDA Towers project by October, says Divakar Reddy
content: The project is coming up on 15 floors spread over 3.60 acres, with a total built-up area of 8,28,300 sq.ft.

title: India, Australia agree to work together to combat terrorism in all its forms
content: Australian Deputy Prime Minister Richard Marles calls on Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh, reviews the defence partnership between the two countries

title: Concern over revision of FYUGP regulations in Calicut varsity
content: The revised clause will undermine interdisciplinary learning and limit employability prospects, especially for Commerce students, says Senate member

title: Modi likely to attend BRICS-11 summit in Brazil next month, with leaders of Russia, China and developing world
content: Countering terrorism post Operation Sindoor is a key theme for India; PM’s attendance comes despite U.S. concerns over India’s participation in BRICS and possible initiatives to find alternative trade currencies

title: Woman held ‘hostage’ in video call scam for over a day in Chalakudy; ₹40,000 lost
content: Scammer appeared on a video call dressed in a police uniform and claimed that a duplicate SIM card issued in the victim’s name had been used by a man for illegal activities

title: Flash inspections under way against banned tobacco products
content: Along with the local police, special squads from the District Anti-Narcotics Special Action Force and Crime Squad members under the District Police Chiefs will take part in flash inspections

title: ‘Back to School’ helps over 50 children resume education
content: Claimed to be the first of its kind in the State, the project was launched under the social policing wing of the Kozhikode City police

title: Former MLA, Congress leader arrested in Chhattisgarh over remarks on Prime Minister
content: Separate FIRs registered in Bilaspur and Bhilai under provisions of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita and IT Act

title: 100 new power sub-stations proposed in State: George
content: 44 sub-stations to be completed in Mysuru district within two years; Over 600 hamlets to be electrified under CESC limits

title: Malayalam film policy draft to be presented at conclave in August
content: A total of 75 meetings have been held with various stakeholders in the industry as part of efforts at formulating the policy, say sources

title: Rain spells take a toll on cardamom plantations in Idukki
content: According to Agriculture department, 310.69 ha of cardamom plantations have been destroyed in the strong wind and heavy rain in the district

title: Nandyal MP Byreddy Shabari highlights India’s progress on climate goal front at BRICS Parliamentary Forum in Brazil
content: She stresses the need for gender-inclusive climate policies, and the important role women can play in environment protection

title: IB officer’s death: accused taken to Kochi for evidence collection
content: Accused reportedly confesses that deceased IB officer had visited him at his apartment on multiple occasions

title: Municipal commissioners directed to step up sanitation ahead of monsoon
content: With the monsoon approaching, he cautioned the municipal health wing officials to be vigilant against outbreaks of waterborne diseases

title: 47 ‘minor’ girls rescued from four shrimp processing units in Nellore district
content: Cases have been filed against these firms and the labour contractors at Kodavalur, Dagadarthi and Indukurupeta police stations

title: ‘Priyank Kharge must resign on moral grounds as law and order has failed in Kalaburagi’
content: False case filed under the Atrocities Act against BJP MLC N. Ravikumar termed politically motivated and vendetta politics

title: In a first, WII experts collar three fishing cats in Coringa Wildlife Sanctuary in Andhra Pradesh
content: Seven more will be collared under the Fishing Cat Collaring Project to study the  home range, behaviour, feeding, breeding, and prey pattern of the endangered species, they say

title: HC asks govt. to take decision on plea to appoint special public prosecutor in Shuhaib case
content: State government asked to take a decision within six weeks. Shuhaib, a Youth Congress leader from Kannur, was hacked to death

title: Train from Anantapur to Bengaluru flagged off
content: Long-cherished dream of the people of Anantapur has finally come true with the flagging off of the first train starting from the district, says Anantapur MP

title: IRS officer suspended after assault on his junior
content: Joint Commissioner of Income Tax Yogendra Kumar Mishra has been directed not to leave the headquarters without prior permission

title: Punishing the guilty is our policy, not political vendetta, asserts Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: A transparent investigation is underway into the charges of corruption and irregularities of the previous government, and once a crime is proven, no one will be spared, no matter what their stature is, he asserts

title: Odisha’s women farmers export mangoes to Italy, reaping global rewards
content: With support from FPOs and institutional tie-ups, women in Dhenkanal are exporting Amrapali mangoes to Europe, marking a quiet agricultural success

title: Mobile recovery mela: Over 601 stolen phones worth over ₹1.2 crore returned
content: Majority of the recovered mobile phones were traced to Telangana, Tamil Nadu, and even as far as Maharashtra and Uttar Pradesh.

title: Four arrested under Goonda Act, 31 externed from Dharwad district
content: The arrested accused have been sent to prisons in Dharwad, Kalaburagi and Mysuru, says Hubballi-Dharwad Police Commissionerate

title: Engineers told to expedite Bengaluru-Vijayawada Expressway works in Sri Sathya Sai district
content: The expressway will galvanise the connectivity between Bengaluru and Vijayawada, drastically cut down travel time and distance, besides boosting the economic landscape of the district, says Collector

title: Reliance, Airtel group challenges ‘low’ India satcom fee which can help Starlink
content: The Cellular Operators Association of India in a May 29 letter to the Telecoms Ministry sought a review of those pricing proposals, saying traditional players pay higher upfront auction charges for telecoms spectrum which make their payments to the government for spectrum roughly 21% higher, when compared to what satellite players would pay

title: People made NDA’s victory possible, says Civil Supplies Minister Nadendla Manohar
content: Observing that the YSRCP suffered severe drubbing in the elections as it got its priorities wrong and was least bothered about development, he says the coalition government is striving to fulfil the aspirations of the people by finely balancing welfare and development

title: Officials interact with villagers of Devalampeta ST Colony regarding DA-JGUA initiative
content: Devalampeta ST Colony, with a total of 194 households, of which 110 are tribal, has been chosen under the DA-JGUA initiative to ensure focused and sustainable rural development

title: Madden NFL 26 cover star Saquon Barkley's ratings throughout his career
content: saquon Barkley is the cover star of the upcoming iteration of the football sim . he is the first member of the 99 club -- the illustrious circle of athletes starting the season with a 99 OVR . his debut performance, which netted him NFL Offensive Rookie of the Year, added nine points to his initial rating .

title: Jeanty tops among 20 rookies who should be selected in fantasy drafts
content: the focus is on redraft formats in 10-team PPR leagues . the top 20 rookies are ranked, along with the rounds they should be targeted . it's never too early to start planning for the fantasy season . we are less than 100 days from opening night in Philly .

title: Blockbuster semifinal at the French Open: Will Swiatek or Sabalenka win?
content: aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek face off in the semifinals at the french open on friday . the two have played 12 times, with the pair leading 8-4 overall and 5-1 on clay . femail's samir khan is the world's no. 1 for the first time since the semis .

title: Don't hesitate to get Harper and Chisholm back into lineups
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . fantasy managers return Bryce Harper to their lineups last night after missing five games due to being plunked in the elbow by a pitch . the same goes for jazz Chisholm Jr.

title: Mayfield, Wirfs among Buccaneers to dye hair at 'Cut and Color Funds the Cure' event
content: the "Cut and Color Funds the Cure" event benefiting the national pediatric cancer foundation . it included quarterback Baker Mayfield getting his hair spray-painted the team's colors of red and creamsicle orange by pediatric cancer survivors . the event was nearing $80,000 in donations for 2025 .

title: Road to the MCWS: NCAA baseball tournament schedule, results
content: this is the first time the ACC has more super regional teams than the SEC since 2008 . UTSA and u.s. are making their first appearances in super regionals . the field of 16 includes five teams from ACC (the most in ACC history)

title: Betting interest on Fever games dips by half after Caitlin Clark injury
content: the amount wagered on the Fever's two games last week at Caesars Sportsbook was half as much as the team's first four games of the season . caitlin Clark suffered a quad strain . the team attracted more than 90% of the money-line bets in its first three games .

title: Why the Panthers will win the Stanley Cup (again)
content: a rematch between the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers is "an incredible final" he wants to see Connor McDavid rewarded for his 10 years of trying to will the Oilers to their first Stanley Cup since 1990 . he is voted the playoffs' most valuable player moments after losing in the championship finale .

title: Expert picks for Thunder-Pacers
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers are the last two teams left standing . the Pacers won the series in five games, four of which featured 30-plus point outings from NBA MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander . this is the Thunder's second finals appearance, and it would be their first as the Oklahoma city Thunder .

title: Conn Smythe Watch: Connor McDavid for MVP of the playoffs -- win or lose?
content: the 2025 Stanley Cup playoffs are down to their final two teams . the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers meet for the second straight season . one of the players in this series is going to win the Conn Smythe as NHL postseason MVP .

title: Stanley Cup Final preview: Everything you need to know for Panthers-Oilers II﻿
content: a team appearing in the Stanley Cup Final in back-to-back years is something of a rarity . it's rarer still that both teams meet up again in consecutive Cup Finals . the two teams are back at it again starting with Game 1 on Wednesday .
